We Offer A Variety Of Training Courses As Well As One-On-One Instruction

NRA Basic Pistol Course & VA Concealed Carry Permit

This 6 hour course is a detailed course includes both lecture, hands-on and range time. It is intended for all individuals regardless of experience.

View course
First Step Pistol Orientation with Concealed Carry Permit.

This 3+ hour express course taught by NRA Certified Instructors in a fun and relaxed environment.

View course
One-on-One Instruction

Could your shooting game use a little tweaking, or are you a brand new shooter? We are here to help! With our sixty-minute lesson you will gain a practical and working understanding of the fundamentals. Live Fire Instruction works out of the NRA Range, located in Fairfax, VA.

View course
NRA CCW Advanced Pistol Course

The NRA CCW Advanced Pistol course, which includes both classroom and range time. It will focus on the techniques needed to develop a defensive mindset. The goal of the course will be to develop the knowledge, skills, and attitude necessary to carry and use a concealed pistol ethically, responsibly, and with confidence.

View course
